SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BinaryGray
Binary Gray codes of length n.
BinaryGray.AsBigMasks
Iterable over BigInteger Gray bitmasks, any n >= 0.
BinaryGray.AsBits
Iterable over bit vectors (arrays of 0/1), minimal-change order, any n >= 0.
BinaryGray.AsInts
Iterable over int Gray codes, n <= 31.
BinaryGray.AsLongMasks
Iterable over long Gray bitmasks, n <= 62.
BinaryGray.AsSubsets
Iterable over subsets as sorted index arrays, minimal-change order, any n >= 0.
BinaryGray.AsToggles
Iterable over minimal-change toggle events (length 2^n - 1).
BinaryGray.Builder
Builder bound to n bits, offering multiple views of the same Gray sequence.
BinaryGray.Toggle
Minimal-change event: bit BinaryGray.Toggle.index flipped to BinaryGray.Toggle.value.
CartesianProduct
Fluent API for generating tuples from a mixed-radix Cartesian product.
CartesianProduct.Product
Iterable view of the Cartesian product for fixed dimensions.
Combinations
Utilities for enumerating k-subsets (combinations) of the ground set {0,1,...,n-1}.
Combinations.KChoose
Sized iterable over k-combinations (with or without repetition).
Combinations.Spec
Immutable, fluent specification for building combination iterables.
Derangements
Derangements — full-length permutations p of {0,1,...,n-1} with no fixed points (p[i] != i for all i).
Derangements.All
Iterable wrapper for all derangements of a given size.
Derangements.Builder
Fluent builder for derangement enumeration and counts.
IndexingAdapter<E>
Bridges from indices to elements.
Permutations
Fluent API for generating k-permutations (ordered selections without repetition) from the domain {0,1,...,n-1}.
Permutations.Builder
Builder capturing the domain size n.
Permutations.KTake
Iterable view of all k-permutations from {0..n-1}.
PowerSet
PowerSet — all subsets of {0,1,...,n-1}.
